amendment.description: An amendment numbered 3 printed in House Report 116-457 to require certifications be made to Congress when the President deploys active duty military within the United States during civil unrest by amending the Insurrection Act in Title 10, Chapter 13 of U.S. Code.
amendment.purpose: Amendment requires certifications be made to Congress when the President deploys active duty military within the United States during civil unrest by amending the Insurrection Act in Title 10, Chapter 13 of U.S. Code.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Escobar amendment (A002) Agreed to by the Yeas and Nays: 215 - 190 (Roll no. 141).

action.text: The previous question was ordered on the amendment (A002) without objection.
Roll call votes on amendments in House
